Class Seat

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
XmlSerializable, XmlUnserializable
public class Seat
extends java.lang.Object
implements XmlSerializable, XmlUnserializable

Allows individual seats to be booked as part of a TheatreSession.
